TopicTitle: Eve can be such a depressing planet

Articles.Content: With clouds, eve can be such a depressing planet. The stars and sun are barely visible. The clouds make you feel so alone :c.

Toxic superheated amosphere, low visibility and (probably radioactive) wasteland everywhere. Plus even if you survive the aerocapture and landing, you're probably not coming back. Welcome to hell Eve.
As one great comedian said: "It's not even that hot!"

The broken stayputnik further enhances the futility and hopelessness of the shot.

But I'm still going to go there.
It is depressing, but not very much. Enough clouds to obscure Kerbol would be even better. Also the purple color doesn't help, either.
